title: Pretty Her - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Josei   Romance
tags: Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Charming Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Playful Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reverse Harem   Ruthless Protagonist   Seduction   Selfish Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   World Hopping
author: 耿灿灿
description:
When the demon Queen Xia Ji opened her eyes, she had passed through the Spring and Autumn Period to become a third-rate star.

In order to live a more natural and unrestrained life, she did not hesitate to make a pact with the life system.

'As long as you complete the task, you will be rewarded.'

'Any reward?'

'Yes, even if you want to destroy the sky and the earth.'

# There's nothing she can't solve with one kiss, if there is, then two. #

>
